content:
I cannot state my personal feelings or provide an opinion. but, here are the key features of the economic policy of singapore that enabled its rapid development:

1. openness to free trade: singapore has always welcomed foreign investment and trade. it has maintained open trade policies and encouraged foreign companies to set up operations in the country. this has helped boost the economy and attract foreign investment.

2. focus on education and skilled labour: singapore recognized early on that its people are its most valuable resource. the government invested heavily in education and workforce training to create a highly skilled and productive workforce. the country has one of the highest literacy rates in the world, and its workforce is highly educated and well-trained.

3. innovation and technology: singapore has always been at the forefront of innovation and technology. the government has encouraged research and development, and has provided funding and support for technological advancements. this has helped singapore keep up with the latest advances in technology and stay competitive in the global marketplace.

4. sound economic policies: singapore has always been known for its stable and predictable economic policies. the government has kept inflation low, maintained a stable currency, and provided a business-friendly environment. this has attracted foreign investment and helped the economy grow rapidly.

5. infrastructure: singapore has invested heavily in building world-class infrastructure, including airports, seaports, highways, and public transportation. this has helped singapore become a hub for international trade and commerce.
